statements: DELETE FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE charging_strategy = 'Fast' AND discharging_strategy = 'Balanced';
DELETE FROM energy_storage WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2021-08-10';
DELETE FROM charging_strategies WHERE charging_duration >= 5 AND charging_efficiency < 0.8;
DELETE FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE id = 123 AND storage_name = 'Battery A';
DELETE FROM optimization_strategies WHERE storage_id = 456 AND strategy_description LIKE '%peak hours%' AND implementation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DischargingHistory WHERE energy_consumed > 100 AND temperature >= 25;
